backend/main.mo: Defines the Motoko actor with data types for training sessions, belts, profiles, goals, achievements, techniques, and system stats.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records linking implemented UI gradient effects and component updates to specific files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains a JSON-style mapping of frontend file paths to brief functional summaries of each component or utility.
frontend/DRAFT_127_REDEPLOY_ASSERTION.md: Documents a quick redeploy for Draft 127 with no code, UI, or schema changes and includes verification steps.
frontend/DRAFT_128_REDEPLOY_ASSERTION.md: Outlines Draft 128 redeploy requirements confirming zero code changes and providing a checklist for verification.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining light/dark theme CSS variables and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/REBUILD_DEPLOY_DRAFT_105.md: Describes clean rebuild and redeploy steps for Draft 105 with no functional or UI changes.
frontend/REBUILD_DEPLOY_DRAFT_110.md: Records the clean rebuild and redeploy procedure for Draft 110 with pre-deployment checks and commands.
frontend/REBUILD_DEPLOY_DRAFT_115.md: Tracks rebuild and redeploy steps for Draft 115, confirming no code or schema changes.
frontend/REBUILD_DEPLOY_DRAFT_125.md: Documents Draft 125 clean rebuild and redeploy with verification and environment checks.
frontend/REBUILD_DEPLOY_DRAFT_127.md: Outlines clean rebuild and redeploy steps for Draft 127 with no modifications allowed.
frontend/REBUILD_DEPLOY_DRAFT_128.md: Describes Draft 128 rebuild and redeploy with checklist ensuring no source changes.
frontend/REBUILD_DEPLOY_DRAFT_94.md: Provides rebuild and redeploy checklist for Draft 94, confirming no code or UI modifications.
frontend/REDEPLOY_NOTE_DRAFT_105.md: Template documenting redeploy steps, status, and verification for Draft 105.
frontend/REDEPLOY_NOTE_DRAFT_110.md: Redeploy note template for Draft 110 covering deployment steps, status, and error capture.
frontend/REDEPLOY_NOTE_DRAFT_115.md: Template for recording redeploy information, status checks, and errors for Draft 115.
frontend/REDEPLOY_NOTE_DRAFT_125.md: Template-style draft documenting deployment metadata, steps executed, and outcome for Draft 125.
frontend/REDEPLOY_NOTE_DRAFT_127.md: Draft 127 redeploy note describing context, potential failing steps, and error location placeholders.
frontend/REDEPLOY_NOTE_DRAFT_128.md: Draft 128 redeploy note outlining deployment context, steps, and error detail placeholders.
frontend/REDEPLOY_NOTE_TEMPLATE.md: General template for recording redeploy attempt metadata, target components, and failure details.
frontend/SMOKE_CHECK_DRAFT_105.md: Smoke test checklist for Draft 105 focused on verifying login screen rendering and errors.
frontend/SMOKE_CHECK_DRAFT_110.md: Smoke check for Draft 110 with initial load checks and canister metadata fields.
frontend/SMOKE_CHECK_DRAFT_115.md: Smoke test for Draft 115 verifying initial load and Internet Identity visibility.
frontend/SMOKE_CHECK_DRAFT_125.md: Draft 125 smoke check confirming app load behavior and noting console errors.
frontend/SMOKE_CHECK_DRAFT_127.md: Comprehensive smoke test for Draft 127 covering load, authentication, actor init, dashboard, and profile gating.
frontend/SMOKE_CHECK_DRAFT_128.md: Smoke test for Draft 128 verifying initial load, branding, login button, and console status.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app controlling authentication flow, actor initialization, profile setup, and dashboard rendering.
frontend/src/components/AddTechniqueDial: Dialog component for adding a technique with fields, YouTube thumbnail detection, tag handling, and form submission.
frontend/src/components/AddTrainingDialo: Dialog for creating or editing training sessions with date, duration, theme, mood, and intensity controls.
frontend/src/components/Analytics.tsx: Empty placeholder file for analytics component.
frontend/src/components/BeltTracker.tsx: Handles belt progress display and updates, computes gamified stats, and allows users to change belt and stripe levels.
frontend/src/components/CachedImage.tsx: Preloads an image with fallback handling and displays it with a loading fade effect.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with a credit message and link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the top navigation bar with profile access, theme toggle, and logout functionality.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Provides the login UI using Internet Identity with branded visuals and onboarding features.
frontend/src/components/ProfileAnalytics: Shows detailed training analytics including sessions, submissions, streaks, and belt info with visual components.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Handles user onboarding or profile editing, including username, belt, gym info, and profile picture setup.
frontend/src/components/SubmissionLogSec: Displays and edits a user’s submission log by belt level, syncing local state with backend and detecting unsaved changes.
frontend/src/components/SubmissionSelect: Provides a searchable popover for adding submissions while filtering out already selected ones.
frontend/src/components/TechniqueLibrary: Renders a searchable, filterable list of techniques with category tabs and a dialog for adding new techniques.
Generates a yearly heatmap of training hours using local date mapping and reacts to theme changes.
frontend/src/components/TrainingHoursHea: Builds a detailed ISO‑weekday–aligned yearly hours grid with editing, saving, and color‑coded intensity.
frontend/src/components/TrainingLog.tsx: Displays training session logs with charts, analytics, and an add/edit dialog, fetching sessions and computing metrics like volume, intensity, and correlations.
frontend/src/components/TrainingMonthCal: Renders a month-view calendar of sessions with date grouping, navigation, and styling based on session types, supporting edit callbacks and scroll-dragging.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWrapper.ts: Enhanced actor initialization hook with detailed step logging, creating authenticated or anonymous actors and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useDragToScroll.ts: Provides a ref enabling drag-to-scroll behavior on an element using pointer events.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook managing authentication, identity loading, login state, and AuthClient integration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, registration, and training records using an actor wrapper.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom CSS variables, BJJ color utilities, dark mode theming, and gradient/animation helpers.
frontend/src/lib/beltStatsCalculator.ts: Computes gamified belt statistics from training sessions and submission logs, including progression, experience, submissions, and mastery.
frontend/src/lib/beltUtils.ts: Utility functions for belt image URLs, belt naming, and preloading all belt images.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Maps session theme enums to human-readable labels.
frontend/src/lib/imageCache.ts: In-memory image preloading and caching to prevent flicker during navigation.
frontend/src/lib/intensityUtils.ts: Utilities for intensity labels, badges, numeric conversion, and predefined intensity options.
frontend/src/lib/moodIcons.ts: Maps mood ratings to labels and colors with helpers for retrieving mood data.
frontend/src/lib/submissionLogUtils.ts: Utility functions for normalizing, finding, modifying, and merging submission log entries.
frontend/src/lib/submissionOptions.ts: Exports a constant alphabetized list of BJJ submission names and a type representing any valid submission option.
frontend/src/lib/trainingAnalytics.ts: Provides analytics utilities for training data, including favorite theme, intensity averages, submission counting, time bucketing, and roll averages.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Contains class name merging helpers, local-time date utilities, color mapping for heat maps, and functions for generating a year heat‑map grid.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React, sets up React Query and Internet Identity provider, and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Implements the dashboard UI with tabbed navigation for analytics, training log, belt tracking, and techniques.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, versioning, and a detailed list of existing app features including authentication, actor initialization, secret handling, debug tools, RBAC, and data-access hooks. Serves as the authoritative state snapshot for planning and feature tracking.
